name: Greenway (Krypth, stban, Nekrotik Underlord)
description:
▣ About

Greenway is a video game made for CityGamejam with the requested theme "Sustainable Cities". Based on this, the game is highly inspired by “Conways Game of Life” and aesthetically from the classic game “Minesweeper”.

▣ Controls

To interact with the board, you just have to left-click on a box and it will generate one depending on which one you choose.

With the “R” key you can restart the game, with “S” you can skip the tutorial at the beginning and with “Escape” you close the game.

▣ Credits

—Gustavo Barrios (Game/Level Design, Programmer, Pixel Art) 

—Esteban López (Programmer) 

—José Ariza (Programmer, Animations)
